post:
Hello, Members Of LowEndTalk.   

Stack Network Ltd, founded in 2015, is a fast-growing company specialized in Web Hosting and Website Development & Designing, at this moment we have served over 3K customers throughout the world.  

Stack Network Ltd provides Web Hosting solustions from Cloud Servers to Dedicated Servers, it now has 6 pops located in different continents which are: Los Angeles (US West Coast), New York City (US East), Mainland China, Hong Kong (China), Seoul (Korea) and Düsseldorf (Germany).  

We have our own in house Level I to Level III technicians, developers and designers, most of whom have over 6-year experience in Web Hosting industry and websites development. We are able to provide 24x7x365 customer service via Live Chat, email and support tickets system, in most of the time, you are supposed to get a response in minutes!  

Unlike some of our competitors, Stack Network Ltd want to bring the revolution and performance optimization services, to create a new milestone. We have to be presented to every user is a comprehensive, well thought out but the feasibility of high revolutionary methodology, providing a high level of uninterrupted service and technical support for every customer.  

Our company details here:[https://beta.companieshouse.gov.uk/company/09875794](https://beta.companieshouse.gov.uk/company/09875794)    

Today we want to offer announce a promotional offer on LET. We are offering **50%** recurring discount in all of your budget VPS plans, our plans and prices are listed below:  

Use: **UB59W90CWV** as coupon code, coupon valid till 30th September  

**Plan 1 - Budget-512M**  

1 vCPU Core  
512MB RAM  
20GB HDD  
500GB Monthly Transfer @1Gbps  
1 IPV4 Address Included  
<del>Normal Price: $2.9 USD Monthly</del>  
Discounted Price: $1.45 USD Monthly   
Order Here: https://vezel.thestack.net/cart.php?a=add&pid=1

**Addons:**

Additional IPV4：$1/month each

This offer is valid till 30th Sep. If you have questions contact us via

Or Live Chat.  

**Datacenter Info:**

Thanks and have a good day.
